panels.description: Number of aggregates.
panels.title: Aggregates

panels.description: Number of disks in the aggregate.
panels.title: Disks

panels.description: The aggregate's volume count, which includes both FlexVols and FlexGroup constituents.
panels.title: Volumes

panels.description: Total usable space in bytes, not including WAFL reserve and aggregate Snapshot copy reserve.
panels.title: Total Space

panels.description: Space used or reserved in bytes. Includes volume guarantees and aggregate metadata..
panels.title: Used and Reserved Space

panels.description: Space available in bytes.
panels.title: Available Space

panels.description: Percent of space used.
panels.title: Space Used %

panels.description: Aggregate details.
panels.title: Aggregates

panels.description: Total aggregate size. If aggregate is restricted or offline, a value of 0 is returned.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Total Space

panels.description: Total physical used size of an aggregate.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Physical Space Used

panels.description: Total physical used size percentage of an aggregate.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Physical Space Used %

panels.description: Space available.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Space Available

panels.description: The amount of inactive data in an aggregate.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Inactive Data

panels.description: Inactive data percentage of an aggregate.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Inactive Data %

panels.description:
Displays the logical space usage of aggregates in the attached object store.

*Note:* This field is only supported for Rest Collector.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by logical space usage in Object Store

panels.description:
Displays the physical space usage of aggregates in the attached object store.

*Note:* This field is only supported for Rest Collector.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by physical space usage in Object Store

panels.description: Used space in bytes in the cloud store. Only applicable for aggregates with a cloud store tier.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Capacity Tier Used

panels.description: This panel displays detail of space used by snapshot copies and available space for Snapshot copies in bytes.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Space Used by Snapshots

panels.description: Amount of space saved by storage efficiency.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  SIS space saved

panels.description: Space saved in bytes by compacting the data.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Data Compaction space saved

panels.description: The percentage of disk space currently in use based on user-visible file count on the referenced file system.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Inodes Used %

panels.description: This panel displays detail of Number of user-visible files used in the referenced file system and Maximum number of user-visible files that this referenced file system can currently hold.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Inodes Files

panels.description: This panel displays detail of number of files that can currently be stored on disk for system metadata files and number of files that can currently be stored on disk for user-visible files.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Inode Capacity

panels.description: The percentage of disk space currently in use based on user-visible file (inode) count on the referenced file system.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Snapshot Inodes Used %

panels.description: Percentage of disk space used by Snapshot copies.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Space Used by Snapshots %

panels.description: Percentage of disk space used by Snapshot copies.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by  Space Used by Snapshots %

panels.description: This panel displays detail of total files allowed in snapshot copies and total files created in snapshot copies.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Snapshot Files

panels.description: This panel displays detail of files in use by snapshot copies, the largest value to which the maxfiles-available parameter can be increased by reconfiguration, on the referenced file system and maximum files available for snapshot copies.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Snapshot MaxFiles

panels.description: Percentage of space reserved for Snapshot copies.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Space Reserved for Snapshots %

panels.description: Storage efficiency ratio without snapshots and flexclones.
panels.title: Data Reduction

panels.description: Storage efficiency ratio with flexclones.
panels.title: Data Reduction with FlexClones

panels.description: Storage efficiency ratio of total space used.
panels.title: Data Reduction with Snapshots & FlexClones

panels.description: Logical used.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Logical Used

panels.description: Total data deduction physical used without snapshots and Flexclones.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Physical Used

panels.description: Logical used with flexclones.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Logical Used with FlexClones

panels.description: Total Data Reduction Physical Used with FlexClones.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Physical Used with FlexClones

panels.description: Logical Used with Snapshots & flexClones.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Logical Used with Snapshots & FlexClones

panels.description: Physical Used with Snapshots & FlexClones.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Physical Used with Snapshots & FlexClones

panels.description: Disk Utilization per Aggregate for latest record (independent of time range selected).

targets.expr:
avg by (node, aggr) (aggr_disk_busy{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",node=~"$Node",aggr=~"$Aggregate"})
and 
topk(
    $TopResources,
    avg by (node, aggr) (avg_over_time(aggr_disk_busy{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",node=~"$Node",aggr=~"$Aggregate"}[3h]))
)

panels.title: Top $TopResources Average Disk Utilization per Aggregate

panels.description: Disk Utilization per Aggregate in the selected time range.

targets.expr:
avg by (node, aggr) (aggr_disk_busy{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",node=~"$Node",aggr=~"$Aggregate"})
and 
topk(
    $TopResources,
    avg by (node, aggr) (avg_over_time(aggr_disk_busy{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",node=~"$Node",aggr=~"$Aggregate"}[3h]))
)

panels.title: Top $TopResources Average Disk Utilization Per Aggregate

panels.description: This panel displays detail of percentage of HDD read operations replace by SSD and number of HDD read operations replaced by SSD reads per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Flash Pool Activity

panels.description: This panel displays detail of average of RAID I/O latency on read hit and average read miss latency.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by SSD and HDD Latency

panels.description: This panel displays detail of total read/write/total cached SSD blocks.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Flash Pool Capacity Used

panels.description: Number of read-cache/write-cache blocks per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Cache Inserts

panels.description: Number of block destage/free per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Cache Removals

panels.description: A summation of volume footprints (including volume guarantees), in bytes. This includes all of the volume footprints in the block_storage tier and the cloud_storage tier.This is an advanced property; there is an added computational cost to retrieving its value. The field is not populated for either a collection GET or an instance GET unless it is explicitly requested using the fields query parameter containing either footprint or **.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Performance Tier Footprint

panels.description: Volume footprints percent.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Performance Tier Footprint %

panels.description: Used space in bytes in the cloud store. Only applicable for aggregates with a cloud store tier.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Capacity Tier Footprint

panels.description: Flexgroup by-aggregate filtering does not display the per-aggregate breakdown, instead the sum of all flexgroup aggregates is displayed. This is how ONTAP reports the data, even when an aggregate is selected in the dropdown.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Space Used by Aggregate

panels.description: Flexgroup by-aggregate filtering does not display the per-aggregate breakdown, instead the sum of all flexgroup aggregates is displayed. This is how ONTAP reports the data, even when an aggregate is selected in the dropdown.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Space Used %

panels.description: Flexgroup by-aggregate filtering does not display the per-aggregate breakdown, instead the sum of all flexgroup aggregates is displayed. This is how ONTAP reports the data, even when an aggregate is selected in the dropdown.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Snapshot Space Used

panels.description:
Flexgroup by-aggregate filtering does not display the per-aggregate breakdown, instead the sum of all flexgroup aggregates is displayed. This is how ONTAP reports the data, even when an aggregate is selected in the dropdown.

Note that in some scenarios, it is possible to exceed 100% of the space allocated.
.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Snapshot Space Used %

panels.description: Footprint of blocks written to the volume in bytes for the performance tier (bin 0).
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Performance Tier Footprint

panels.description: Footprint of blocks written to the volume in performance tier (bin 0) as a percentage of aggregate size.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Performance Tier Footprint %

panels.description: Footprint of blocks written to the volume in bytes for capacity tier (bin 1).
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Capacity Tier Footprint

panels.description: Footprint of blocks written to the volume in capacity tier (bin 1) as a percentage of aggregate size.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Capacity Tier Footprint %

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process all the operations on the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Average Latency

panels.description: Volume total throughput.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Average Throughput

panels.description: Number of operations per second serviced by the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by IOPs

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process read request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read Latency

panels.description: Bytes read per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read Throughput

panels.description: Number of read operations per second from the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Read IOPs

panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process write request to the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write Latency

panels.description: Bytes written per second.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write Throughput

panels.description: Number of write operations per second to the volume.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Volumes by Write IOPs
